VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Blasting
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expertise in maximizing the impact of ranged attacks, delivering more devastating shots.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Mortaring
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expertise in operating mortars, improving their effectiveness in long-range bombardment as well as their damage.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Pummeling
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expertise in relentless melee attacks, maintaining high sustained damage.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Cleaving
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expertise in delivering powerful melee strikes that maximize damage output.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Evading
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expertise in avoiding melee attacks through agility and reflexes.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Enduring
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expertise in withstanding incoming damage, reducing harm taken in combat.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Crafting quality
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expertise in fine-tuning general, non-artistic craftsmanship, ensuring higher-quality crafted goods.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Crafting yield
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expertise in maximizing material efficiency, reducing waste during crafting.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Smelting
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expertise in smelting materials, efficiently turning slag and unwanted weapons into usable resources.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Panning
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expertise in identifying valuable veins, increasing the chance of finding extra gold while mining.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Salvaging
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expertise in extracting useful materials long buried in the rock, improving the chances of discovering extra components while mining.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Trafficking
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expertise in the harvesting and distribution of illicit substances, ensuring high returns in the underground market.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Influencing
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expertise in spreading and shaping ideologies, increasing the frequency of social influence and reducing certainty loss.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Psycasting
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expertise in harnessing and focusing psychic energy, improving control and effectiveness in psycasting.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Quelling
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expertise in swiftly suppressing unnatural entities, increasing the speed of their activity suppression.
